    Kashif Gul

    • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/1170960035681245
    • Última atualização do currículo em 13/04/2018

    Graduation from Islamia College Peshawar. Masters in Chemistry (2007) from Institute of Chemical Sciences University of Peshawar, Khyberpakhtukhwa KPK, Pakistan. PhD in Chemistry (2010) at Universidade Federal de Santa Maria, under the supervision of Professor A. L. Braga. Research areas: Ionic Liquid: An efficient media to synthesize diorganyl selenide, sulfide and chiral β-seleno amine derivatives (Texto informado pelo autor)
